product_name: The North Face Regulate Soft-Shell Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Keep up your training even through cool weather with the Regulate Soft-Shell Jacket from The North Face. A mix of wind-resistant and breathable mesh fabrics ensures comfort in variable conditions. TNF(TM) Apex stretch-polyester exterior is lightweight and wind-resistant; interior mesh lining helps wick moisture away from skin to keep you cool and dry. Mesh panels on the side and down the center of the neck and back enhance breathability and temperature regulation. Hand pockets provide on-the-go storage; reflective details enhance visibility in low light. The North Face Regulate Soft-Shell Jacket features a hem drawcord to seal in heat; articulated elbows ensure a perfect fit while in motion.
short_description: Keep up your training even through cool weather with the Regulate Soft-Shell Jacket from The North Face. A mix of wind-resistant and breathable mesh fabrics ensures comfort in variable conditions.
